location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Charge d'affaires at the Court of Persia to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a letter from Henry Willock to the Marquis of Hastings [Francis Rawdon Hastings], dated 15 August 1818, which discusses the case of Aga Ismael [Āghā Ismā’īl]; a Persian pensioner of the East India Company who owes a large sum of money to the Nizam ud Dowlah [Niẓām al-Dawlah].
